1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: WN_CLEAR.C Fri 10-27-2000 9:43:56 pm HvA V2.01 $
3    | 
4    | DESC: clear window function for HVA_WIN
5    | HIST: 20001027 V2.01 - Adapted for DJGPP
6    | ***************************************************************************/
7    | 
8    | /*---------------------------------------
9    |   WN_CLEAR.C
10   | ---------------------------------------*/
11   | 
12   | #include "video/v_video.h"
13   | #include "window.h"
14   | 
15   | 
16   | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
17   |    FUNCTION: wn_clear()
18   |     PURPOSE: Clear contents of a window
19   |      SYNTAX: int wn_clear(WINDOW *w);
20   | DESCRIPTION: -
21   |     RETURNS: NO_WINDOW if no window opened
22   |              TRUE      if all ok
23   |     HISTORY: 910718 V0.1 - Initial version
24   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
25   | int wn_clear(WINDOW *w)
26   | {
27   |   int l,h;
28   | 
29   |   wn_log("wn_clear(%p,%s) (%d,%d) x2=%d  y2=%d\n",w,w->title,w->y1,w->x1,w->x2,w->y2);
30   | 
31   |   /*----------------------------------------
32   |     Check if window opened and top window.
33   |   -----------------------------------------*/
34   |   if (!w)
35   |     return(NO_WINDOW);
36   |   if (w != top_window)
37   |     wn_top(w);
38   | 
39   |   /*-----------------------------------------------------
40   |     Clear window by filling in attribute and SPACE's and
41   |     Put cursor in upper-right corner of window
42   |   -------------------------------------------------------*/
43   |   l = w->x2 - w->x1 + 1;
44   |   h = w->y2 - w->y1 + 1;
45   |   wn_log("l=%d   h=%d   color=%d   \n",l,h,w->wcolor);
46   |   v_fillarea(w->y1,w->x1,l,h,' ',w->wcolor);
47   |   wn_locate(w,0,0);
48   | 
49   |   return(TRUE);
50   | }
